definitions.definition: A gathering for the purpose of discussion; a symposium .
A form of discussion involving a panel of presenters and often participation by members of the audience.
An Internet message board where users can post messages regarding one or more topics of discussion.
examples: Trish was an admin on three forums , and had no trouble at all when it came to moderating them.

definitions.definition: A square or marketplace in a Roman town, used for public business and commerce .

secondary_definitions: A gathering for the purpose of discussion; a symposium .
A form of discussion involving a panel of presenters and often participation by members of the audience.
( Internet ) An Internet message board where users can post messages regarding one or more topics of discussion.
( historical ) A square or marketplace in a Roman town, used for public business and commerce .
